text: avarkal (porukkup) purappata natiyiruntal, atarku ventiya tayarippukalaic ceytirupparkal; eninum avarkal purappatuvatai allah veruttu, avarkal purappatatavaru tatai ceytuvittan; (poril kalantu kolla mutiyap penkal, mutiyavarkalaippol)"tankupavarkalutan, ninkalum tankivitunkal" enru (avarkalukku) kurappattatu
